attributes.action: require all products sold in the UK to state clearly in which country they are made.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I like many British citizens try to buy British-made products. This however is made difficult by the fact that many products sold in the UK do not clearly state where they are made. I believe the USA requires such labelling and would like the Prime Minister to support our efforts to support British-made goods by this simple change in legislation.
